content.html: I am now seeing several journalists asking for Current Friends to contact them via Signal to talk about these policies. Any Friend found to be leaking privileged information may face a reduction in benefits from our Friends With Benefits™ program, or possible termination.
content.value:
I am now seeing several journalists asking for Current Friends to contact them via Signal to talk about these policies.

Any Friend found to be leaking privileged information may face a reduction in benefits from our Friends With Benefits™ program, or possible termination.
